comment: He is beyond understanding and a very kind professor. Had some family stuff come up and was more than willing to work around my issues. His assignments make sense and homework is not unreasonable. He has many resources is very communicative. Seriously take his class he is a blessing amongst the scourge that is ksu professors.

It took me three tries to pass Precalc, and I only did it because of Professor Davenport. He uses MyMathLab extensively, but he's always ready to answer questions outside of class through texts or email. He also has extra consideration for students who use the optional MML practice. An amazing math teacher, if only he would teach Calculus as well.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS

comment: MML is used, you don't need the book. HW and quizzes are half the grade, but you get infinite tries. DO THEM. Tests are 25%, Final is 25%. He is very good at teaching but finding a reason to drive to Marietta if you're in Kennesaw is tough when you get up for rush hour. Go the class before the test for reviews. REALLY NICE MAN, personable w/stud's
Best teacher I have ever had. Always willing to help if you need it and a really cool guy. Gives everyone a chance and is understanding of mistakes or when it gets hard to understand. Great guy.

I took him for Pre-Calc. The class is Easy as long as you do the work. Attendance is not Mandatory but its up to you to do you homework and quizzes online on mymathlab. Professor gives study guides for in class tests, there are only 2 in class test and one final exam. Everything else is online.

Professor Davenport saved my behind!! Everything originally had a set due date, but because so many students were having issues, he made it all due the day before the final. I got to only show up on review days and still be confident of an A. His lectures are easy to understand, and he will go the extra mile for you. Take him! Worth the commute!

Mr. Davenport keeps it interesting with his lectures, and while he isn't necessarily a hard teacher, there is a lot of online work involved in MyMathLab. Which if you haven't heard of it yet you will remember it for how annoying it is. But if you keep up with the online work and do it early (assigned weekly/ bi-weekly) it should be an easy class...

Mr. Davenport was an amazing teacher. He is very interact with his class and loves participation. Attendance is not mandatory but makes the class a lot easier to understand. He takes time to explain things and answer any question no matter what. Is very understanding and works with you if he is familiar with you. Would definitely take him again!!

Davenport is a breath of fresh air as far as math goes. He is laid back and funny and his teaching style is very easy to keep up with. There is a lot of online homework, and it is due every Sunday, which will make or break your grade. 2 tests and final. He gives study guide for all 3 that are almost identical. MARIETTA CAMPUS BUT WORTH COMMUTE!!!
First math teacher I've ever had that was engaging. Very presentable, lots of communication with students, ran a very open classroom.
